Regardless of the fact that this guy is against any and all religions, he makes a brilliant demonstration that moral relativity is irresponsible
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hj9oB4zpHww&feature=relmfu

What do you mean "regardless of the fact this this guy is against any and all religions"? It's part of his point! We should no longer let religious figures and books define our morals regardless of human well being.

Apart from that, I've been reading this guy a bit lately... I was surprised to discover he's so young in the video. Dawkins quotes him quite a lot :-)
